name: .LINEA File Extension
summary: Learn about .LINEA files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a LINEA file in Linea Sketch (iOS) or Linea Link (Mac). In Linea Sketch, you can edit the drawing a LINEA file contains. In Linea Link, you can view the drawing, export it to other apps (such as Adobe Photoshop), and convert it to more common file formats.

You can also decompress a LINEA file using any Zip-decompression utility, such as Apple Archive Utility (Mac) or 7-Zip (Window), to view the component files it contains. Before doing so, you must change the file's extension to .ZIP.
You can use Linea Link (Mac) to convert LINEA files to the following formats:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
